entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
